blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Ease of use
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Reduce training time and increase employee compliance to use.

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Expansive and unique menu
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Save time, counter space, and costs with the ability to test chemistry and electrolyte analytes on a single panel and have access to specialty tests including T4, Bile Acids, TCO2, and Phenobarbital on one analyzer

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Intelligent Quality Control (iQC)
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: No more worrying about running controls and calibrations as iQC monitors the analyzer, rotor, and sample before and during every analysis to ensure reliable results

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Little to no maintenance
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Save time and costs plus increase employee compliance to use

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Detects sample interference - hemolysis, lipemia, and icterus
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Diagnose and treat patients confidently as analyte results are suppressed if affected by > 10% interference and receive useful information about sample integrity and handling

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Small footprint and portable
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Use this analyzer anywhere and anytime in various environments

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Cost effective
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Save money with low-price reagents, no control and calibration costs, and no service contracts

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Speed: 12 minutes to results
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Obtain results, diagnose, discuss with clients and begin treatment within one visit

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Stores 5,000 patient records
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Provides peace of mind that results are secure and allows recall of patient history

blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.title: Connectivity
blockFeaturesBenefitsItem.body: Connect with Practice Management Software and external printers using the USB ports and LAN port and/or the VetScan FUSE
